title: Nintendo Workplace Issues Arise - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.04.22
description:
Blessing and Janet tackle a big new report from IGN about Nintendo's handling of contractors, discuss Overwatch 2 updates, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:08:40 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Podcast is up right now with the crew talking about the best and worst streaming services. There’s also a Dr. Strange Multiverse of Madness Spoiler-free Screencast review. Those are up on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and podcast services around the globe.

Over on Kinda Funny Games we’ve got a new episode of Kinda Funny Wrestling where Joey Noelle is wreaking absolute havoc. That’s up right now, Youtube.com/kindafunnygames.

The Roper Report  -

00:10:20 - Nintendo contractors criticize company culture and treatment
00:35:06 - Ads
00:38:04 - Blizzard has discussed Overwatch 2 updates
00:45:20 - ‘Overwatch 2’ Has Lost 99% Of Its Twitch Audience In A Week
00:52:03 - Blizzard has finally revealed its long-awaited mobile game
00:57:27 - Bungie Speaks out in Support of Roe vs. Wade
01:00:44 - Hitman 3’s game director has joined Crytek
01:03:50 - WWE Superstar The Miz Wants to Play Johnny Cage
01:05:25 - Out today
01:07:16 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
